section.title: &kw-hos-tm; &kw-hos-version-50;: Bringing up a Cloud with the DCN Core Driver

sidebar.title: Bringing up a &kw-hos; cloud with the DCN core plugin
sidebar.para: Bringing up a &kw-hos; cloud with the DCN core plugin is identical to , with the exception of the following required changes:

listitem.para: The following changes need to be made in the control_plane.yml file:
Remove the service component neutron-ml2-plugin from the controller nodes.
Remove the service component dcn-ml2 (if present) from the controller nodes.
Add the service component dcn-core-plugin to the controller nodes.
